actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the interception of certain communications unless all parties to the intercepted communication consent.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits the interception of wire or oral communications unless all parties to the intercepted communication consent. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 2511)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the interception of certain communications unless all parties to the intercepted communication consent.
